info.author: Kai Diefenbach
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
easyshop.payment Readme
=========================

Overview
--------

Payment processors for EasyShop.

   - PayPal
   - Per invoice
   - Pre-payment
   - Direct debit
   - Cash on delivery
   - Credit card
   - Adding of user-defined payment methods
   - Variable restriction of available payment methods based on criteria: country, customer, price, 
weight, etc.
   - Variable calculation of payment costs based on criteria: payment method, country, customer, price, 
weight, etc.    
   - 
More Information
----------------
- http://pypi.python.org/pypi/easyshop.core
  Main product
  
- http://www.geteasyshop.com
  Main site with feature list, faqs and more 
  
- http://code.google.com/p/easyshop-for-plone/
  Code repository
  
- http://groups.google.de/group/easyshop
  Google Group for EasyShop
